downloadDescription: Microsoft Platform Extension required by Windows 8.1 store apps in order to use the Kinect V2 sensor.
detailsSection: Microsoft Platform Extension required by Windows 8.1 store apps in order to use the Kinect V2 sensor.
systemRequirementsSection:
• Recommended Hardware Configuration
    • 64-bit (x64) processor
    • 4 GB Memory (or more)
    • Physical dual-core 3.1 GHz (2 logical cores per physical) or faster processor
    • USB 3.0 controller dedicated to the Kinect for Windows v2 sensor*
    • DX11 capable graphics adapter**
    • A Microsoft Kinect v2 sensor, which includes a power hub and USB cabling

    * If you're adding USB 3.0 functionality to your existing PC through a USB 3.0 host controller adapter, please ensure that it is a Windows 8 compliant device and that it supports Gen-2. See the release notes for additional information regarding USB 3.0 compatibility.
    ** For the current list of good known adapters click here

  • Software Requirements
    • Windows 10 64-bit, Version 1809 or later
installInstructionSection:
To install the Microsoft.WindowsPreview.Kinect.8.1:
  1. Download and extract the contents of WindowsPreview.Kinect_2.2.1905.16001.zip to a location on your PC.
  2. Double click WindowsPreview.Kinect_2.2_Win32.appx and click Install.
  3. Double click WindowsPreview.Kinect_2.2_x64.appx and click Install.
  4. Installation is now complete.
